description:
Miyabi and Kaoru have arrived at some other Sakuraba property: Aoi had asked Miyabi to bring Kaoru to her.
Kaoru begins to remember that he has been at this place on the day when he and Aoi first met as children; he recognizes a big tree where he left his most precious possession in Aoi`s hands.
Meanwhile Miyabi has already left the property, so Aoi and Kaoru will be together alone this night.
